author: dlr
msg: Adam Megacz <adam@megacz.com> pointed out that RFC 2068 demands an
encoding of US-ASCII for most standard HTTP request/response content.
Adjusted accordingly.

author: dlr
msg: getWorker(): Tiny bit of documentation.
getHandler(): Refactored from Worker.executeInternal() into separate
method by Adam Megacz <adam@megacz.com> (to support system.multicall).
invokeHandler(): Refactored from Worker.executeInternal() into
separate method by Adam Megacz <adam@megacz.com> (to support
system.multicall).
Worker.executeInternal(): Patched by Adam Megacz to use getHandler()
and invokeHandler() methods.

author: dlr
msg: system.multicall handler added by Adam Megacz, with documentation and
minor code spruce ups from me.

author: dlr
msg: start(): Rolled back previous commit.  Jim Redman points out that this
is not a valid thing to do when the web server is run via its main()
method.

author: dlr
msg: start(): Marked the "XML-RPC Weblistener" thread as a daemon thread to
assure the JVM will be able to shutdown if this thread is still
running when System.exit() is called or an appropriate signal is sent.
http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.3/docs/api/java/lang/Thread.html#setDaemon(boolean)
